tidbits.title: Rich History
tidbits.description: Mali has a rich history, known for the ancient city of Timbuktu, a center of learning and trade during the height of the Mali Empire.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: The country boasts a vibrant cultural heritage seen in traditional music, art, storytelling, and impressive mud-brick architecture.

tidbits.title: Challenges and Resilience
tidbits.description: Despite facing challenges like droughts and conflicts, Mali's people exhibit resilience, preserving their traditions and way of life.
